data.lyric:
[ti:I Warned Myself]
[ar:Charlie Puth]
[al:I Warned Myself]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Warned Myself - Charlie Puth (查理·普斯)
[00:01.97]I warned myself that I shouldn't play with fire
[00:07.86]But I can tell that I'll do it one more time
[00:13.32]Don't trust in myself
[00:14.76]Mmm
[00:15.88]No good for my health
[00:17.40]Mmm
[00:18.46]You messed with my heart now you're the reason why
[00:23.14]Do you remember when you told me I don't have to worry
[00:28.37]He's overseas out on his tour he'll be okay without me
[00:33.62]You said you had nothing to hide that you left him long ago
[00:38.91]I shoulda known that was a lie
[00:43.83]I warned myself that I shouldn't play with fire
[00:49.44]But I can tell that I'll do it one more time
[00:54.84]Don't trust in myself
[00:56.41]Mmm
[00:57.54]No good for my health
[00:59.11]Mmm
[01:00.25]You messed with my heart now you're the reason why
[01:05.15]I warned myself that I shouldn't play with fire
[01:10.34]But I can tell that I'll do it one more time
[01:15.78]Don't trust in myself
[01:17.35]Mmm
[01:18.50]No good for my health
[01:19.99]Mmm
[01:21.07]You messed with my heart now you're the reason why
[01:25.75]Do you remember when you said Do not tell anybody
[01:30.99]'Cause if you do I'll be the first to put my hands around your throat
[01:36.45]If you had nothing to hide why is no one s'posed to know
[01:41.57]I shoulda know that was a lie
[01:46.29]I warned myself that I shouldn't play with fire
[01:52.17]But I can tell that I'll do it one more time
[01:57.62]Don't trust in myself
[01:59.17]Mmm
[02:00.29]No good for my health
[02:01.70]Mmm
[02:02.75]You messed with my heart now you're the reason why
[02:07.76]I warned myself that I shouldn't play with fire
[02:12.99]But I can tell that I'll do it one more time
[02:18.44]Don't trust in myself
[02:19.98]Mmm
[02:21.03]No good for my health
[02:22.58]Mmm
[02:23.70]You messed with my heart now you're the reason why
data.trans:
[ti:I Warned Myself]
[ar:Charlie Puth]
[al:I Warned Myself]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.97]我警告自己不该玩火自焚
[00:07.86]但我能感知到自己还会冒险
[00:13.32]别轻信自己了
[00:14.76]//
[00:15.88]无益于身心
[00:17.40]//
[00:18.46]你拨弄我的心弦 你就是罪魁祸首
[00:23.14]你还记得那时你告诉我不必担心吗
[00:28.37]你说他去海外旅行了 没有你他也无所谓
[00:33.62]你说你没什么好隐瞒的 你早就离开他了
[00:38.91]我早该明白那不过是谎言
[00:43.83]我警告自己不该玩火自焚
[00:49.44]但我能感知到自己还会冒险
[00:54.84]别轻信自己了
[00:56.41]//
[00:57.54]无益于身心
[00:59.11]//
[01:00.25]你拨弄我的心弦 你就是罪魁祸首
[01:05.15]我警告自己不该玩火自焚
[01:10.34]但我能感知到自己还会冒险
[01:15.78]别轻信自己了
[01:17.35]//
[01:18.50]无益于身心
[01:19.99]//
[01:21.07]你拨弄我的心弦 你就是罪魁祸首
[01:25.75]你还记得那时你说不要告诉任何人吗
[01:30.99]因为如果我泄露消息 你会是第一个教训我的人
[01:36.45]如果你问心无愧 为何不能让他人知晓
[01:41.57]我早该明白那不过是谎言
[01:46.29]我警告自己不该玩火自焚
[01:52.17]但我能感知到自己还会冒险
[01:57.62]别轻信自己了
[01:59.17]//
[02:00.29]无益于身心
[02:01.70]//
[02:02.75]你拨弄我的心弦 你就是罪魁祸首
[02:07.76]我警告自己不该玩火自焚
[02:12.99]但我能感知到自己还会冒险
[02:18.44]别轻信自己了
[02:19.98]//
[02:21.03]无益于身心
[02:22.58]//
[02:23.70]你拨弄我的心弦 你就是罪魁祸首
